recommendations.current_issue: Low CTR and ROAS due to audience saturation and lack of engaging creative format.

creative_variations.headline: Real Men, Real Comfort
creative_variations.message: See why men love our cooling mesh panels — breathable comfort endorsed by real users.
creative_variations.rationale: UGC format has shown higher engagement and trust, leveraging social proof.
creative_variations.inspired_by: Doctors recommend breathable cotton — meet our men athletic briefs.

creative_variations.headline: Stay Cool, Stay Confident
creative_variations.message: Experience the no ride-up guarantee with our best-selling athletic briefs. Perfect for summer workouts.
creative_variations.rationale: Image creatives have higher engagement; focuses on specific product benefits.
creative_variations.inspired_by: Doctors recommend breathable organic cotton — meet our men trunks.

recommendations.audience_considerations: Target active men interested in fitness and comfort.

recommendations.current_issue: Creative lacks differentiation and fails to highlight unique product benefits.

creative_variations.headline: Seamless Comfort, All Day Long
creative_variations.message: Swipe to discover our wire-free bras and panties — invisible under any outfit.
creative_variations.rationale: Carousel format allows showcasing multiple products and benefits, increasing engagement.
creative_variations.inspired_by: Invisible under tees — seamless men inner vests.

creative_variations.headline: Feel the Difference
creative_variations.message: Real women share their love for our seamless panties — comfort you can trust.
creative_variations.rationale: UGC builds trust through authentic testimonials, enhancing credibility.
creative_variations.inspired_by: Push comfort, not wires — everyday women panties.

recommendations.audience_considerations: Focus on women seeking comfort and style in everyday wear.

testing_strategy: Implement A/B testing with a focus on UGC and Carousel formats to measure engagement and conversion improvements.
